This is probably to do with your workspace that may have some error PDE chokes 
on. I am currently working on 20020212 with no problems. Could you specify 
steps to recreate the problem?

It seems weird but the problem was that I was editing org.eclipse.pde.core and 
it was out of sync with the file system. Not sure how it caused the exception, 
though.

The 'out-of-sync' problem has been fixed in the current stream. You can either 
pick the nightly build or wait for the first integration build > 20020214.
